languages.text: Выгодные сделки, заключенные Пустотным братством с династией фон Валанциус, помогли им подчинить меньшие разбойничьи эскадры сектора. На многих мирах и станциях были открыты "дома Братства", в которых с возмутительной откровенностью пиратские представители взимали мзду с торговцев в обмен на безопасное путешествие.

Profitable deals made between the Fellowship of the Void and the von Valancius dynasty helped them subdue smaller brigand squadrons in the sector. Many worlds and stations saw the opening of "Fellowship Dens," in which grotesquely sincere pirate representatives took kickbacks from traders in exchange for safe passage.
languages.original_text: Выгодные сделки, заключенные Пустотным братством с династией фон Валанциус, помогли им подчинить меньшие разбойничьи эскадры сектора. На многих мирах и станциях были открыты "дома Братства", в которых с возмутительной откровенностью пиратские представители взимали мзду с торговцев в обмен на безопасное путешествие.

traits.locale_text: Profitable deals that the Fellowship of the Void made with the von Valancius dynasty helped them subdue smaller brigand squadrons in the sector. Many worlds and stations saw the opening of Fellowship Dens, in which pirate representatives with outrageous honesty charged traders for safe passage.

Profitable deals that the Fellowship of the Void made with the von Valancius dynasty helped them subdue smaller brigand squadrons in the sector. Many worlds and stations saw the opening of Fellowship Dens, in which pirate representatives with outrageous honesty charged traders for safe passage.

Many worlds and stations saw the opening of Fellowship Dens, in which grotesquely sincere pirate representatives took kickbacks from traders in exchange for safe passage.

Many worlds and stations saw the opening of "Fellowship Dens," in which grotesquely sincere pirate representatives took kickbacks from traders in exchange for safe passage.

Profitable deals made between the Fellowship of the Void and the von Valancius dynasty helped them subdue smaller brigand squadrons in the sector. Many worlds and stations saw the opening of "Fellowship Dens," in which grotesquely sincere pirate representatives took kickbacks from traders in exchange for safe passage.

languages.text: 虚空协联和冯·瓦兰修斯王朝达成了有利可图的交易，借助新的力量征服了扩区中较小的海盗舰队。在此之后，许多世界与星站都出现了所谓的“友谊之巢”。在那里，假意真诚的海盗代表从商人那里收取过路费，以此允许他们安全通行。
languages.original_text: Profitable deals made between the Fellowship of the Void and the von Valancius dynasty helped them subdue smaller brigand squadrons in the sector. Many worlds and stations saw the opening of "Fellowship Dens," in which grotesquely sincere pirate representatives took kickbacks from traders in exchange for safe passage.

traits.locale_text: 虚空协联和冯·瓦兰修斯王朝达成了有利可图的交易，借助新的力量征服了扩区中较小的海盗舰队。在此之后，许多世界与星站都出现了所谓的“友谊之巢”。在那里，假意真诚的海盗代表从商人那里收取过路费，以此允许他们安全通行。

languages.text: Profitable Deals zwischen den Gefährten der Leere und der Valancius-Dynastie halfen ihnen, kleinere Geschwader von Räubern im Sektor zu eliminieren. Auf vielen Welten und Stationen wurden Niederlassungen der Gefährten gegründet, in denen grotesk ehrlich wirkende Vertreter der Piraten Schmiergelder von Händlern annahmen und ihnen dafür sicheres Geleit zusicherten.
languages.original_text: Profitable deals made between the Fellowship of the Void and the von Valancius dynasty helped them subdue smaller brigand squadrons in the sector. Many worlds and stations saw the opening of "Fellowship Dens," in which grotesquely sincere pirate representatives took kickbacks from traders in exchange for safe passage.

traits.locale_text: Profitable Deals zwischen den Gefährten der Leere und der Valancius-Dynastie halfen ihnen, kleinere Geschwader von Räubern im Sektor zu eliminieren. Auf vielen Welten und Stationen wurden Niederlassungen der Gefährten gegründet, in denen grotesk ehrlich wirkende Vertreter der Piraten Schmiergelder von Händlern annahmen und ihnen dafür sicheres Geleit zusicherten.

languages.text: Les accords profitables conclus entre la Communauté du vide et la dynastie von Valancius les aidèrent à soumettre de petits groupes de brigands du secteur. De nombreux mondes et stations virent l'ouverture de repaires de la Communauté, dans lesquels des représentants pirates à la sincérité douteuse acceptaient les pots-de-vin des commerçants pour leur garantir un voyage en toute sécurité.
languages.original_text: Profitable deals made between the Fellowship of the Void and the von Valancius dynasty helped them subdue smaller brigand squadrons in the sector. Many worlds and stations saw the opening of "Fellowship Dens," in which grotesquely sincere pirate representatives took kickbacks from traders in exchange for safe passage.

traits.locale_text: Les accords profitables conclus entre la Communauté du vide et la dynastie von Valancius les aidèrent à soumettre de petits groupes de brigands du secteur. De nombreux mondes et stations virent l'ouverture de repaires de la Communauté, dans lesquels des représentants pirates à la sincérité douteuse acceptaient les pots-de-vin des commerçants pour leur garantir un voyage en toute sécurité.

languages.text: Los rentables negocios entre la Hermandad del Vacío y la dinastía von Valancius contribuyeron a la eliminación de los escuadrones de saqueo menores del sector. Muchos mundos y estaciones fueron testigo de la inauguración de guaridas de la Hermandad, donde representantes de los piratas recibían con absoluto descaro sobornos de los comerciantes a cambio de salvoconducto por el sector.
languages.original_text: Profitable deals made between the Fellowship of the Void and the von Valancius dynasty helped them subdue smaller brigand squadrons in the sector. Many worlds and stations saw the opening of "Fellowship Dens," in which grotesquely sincere pirate representatives took kickbacks from traders in exchange for safe passage.

traits.locale_text: Los rentables negocios entre la Hermandad del Vacío y la dinastía von Valancius contribuyeron a la eliminación de los escuadrones de saqueo menores del sector. Muchos mundos y estaciones fueron testigo de la inauguración de guaridas de la Hermandad, donde representantes de los piratas recibían con absoluto descaro sobornos de los comerciantes a cambio de salvoconducto por el sector.

languages.text: 虚空の仲間たちとフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の間で交わされた有益な取引は、星域内の小規模な海賊団を制圧するのに役立った。多くの惑星やステーションには「仲間の隠れ家」が開設され、異様に誠実な海賊の代表が安全な通行と引き換えに貿易商から手付け金を受け取るようになった。
languages.original_text: Profitable deals made between the Fellowship of the Void and the von Valancius dynasty helped them subdue smaller brigand squadrons in the sector. Many worlds and stations saw the opening of "Fellowship Dens," in which grotesquely sincere pirate representatives took kickbacks from traders in exchange for safe passage.

traits.locale_text: 虚空の仲間たちとフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の間で交わされた有益な取引は、星域内の小規模な海賊団を制圧するのに役立った。多くの惑星やステーションには「仲間の隠れ家」が開設され、異様に誠実な海賊の代表が安全な通行と引き換えに貿易商から手付け金を受け取るようになった。

languages.text: Uçsuz Kardeşliği ve von Valancius hanedanlığı arasında yapılan kârlı anlaşmalar, iki tarafın sektördeki daha küçük haydut eskadralarını bastırmasını sağladı. Birçok dünyada "Kardeşlik Uğrakları" açılmaya başlandı. Korsan tarafının temsilcileri; buralarda dürüstlüklerinden ödün vermiyor, tacirlerden rüşvet alıp onlara güvenli geçiş sağlıyordu.
languages.original_text: Profitable deals made between the Fellowship of the Void and the von Valancius dynasty helped them subdue smaller brigand squadrons in the sector. Many worlds and stations saw the opening of "Fellowship Dens," in which grotesquely sincere pirate representatives took kickbacks from traders in exchange for safe passage.

traits.locale_text: Uçsuz Kardeşliği ve von Valancius hanedanlığı arasında yapılan kârlı anlaşmalar, iki organizasyonun sektördeki daha küçük haydut eskadralarını bastırmasını sağladı. Birçok dünyada "Kardeşlik Uğrakları" açılmaya başlandı. Buralarda korsan temsilcileri garip derecede dürüst davranıyor, tacirlerden rüşvet alıp, onlara güvenli geçiş sağlıyorlardı.
